alert.note: Alert for Morris; Sussex (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 4:54PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Morris and southeastern Sussex Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 454 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Mohawk, or 9 miles east of Newton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hopatcong, Kinnelon, Butler, Mount Arlington, Riverdale, Green Pond, Lake Telemark and Lake Mohawk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northern and northwestern New Jersey.
